attributes.action: Make it so this website allows people in addition to joining a petition, to be able to oppose the petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many people are against many of these petitions? It is unknown, because registering opposition to ideas is very difficult. I propose that each petition should have both a for and an against choice. That way, when you have 100,000 people petitioning for something, politicians might find that 500,000 are petitioning against it and both sides therefore have a voice.

rejection.details: We have noted your thoughts on the petitions service, but will treat it as feedback, rather than suitable for a petition.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
